rest.name: Rest
rest.workline: $name will be taking a rest for today.

forage.name: Forage
forage.description:
$name will be looking around for edible berries and fungi.

[color=yellow]Efficiency grows with Wit. Penalty affected by Courage. Strength and Endurance affect carrying weight. [/color]
forage.workline: $name will be foraging in the nearby woods.

hunt.name: Hunt
hunt.description:
$name will try hunting wild animals.

[color=yellow]Efficiency grows Agility and Endurance. Penalty affected by Courage. Strength and Endurance affect carrying weight. [/color]
hunt.workline: $name will be hunting in the nearby woods.

library.name: Library
library.description:
$name will manage the library and study.

[color=yellow]Provides Experience and Learning Points based on Wit and Library level.
Experience efficiency decreases with level.[/color]
library.workline: $name will be studying in the library.

cooking.name: Cooking
cooking.description:
$name will cook for the other residents and buy food from the market when it runs short.

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Poor[/color] or higher. 

Efficiency grows with Agility and Wit. [/color]

maid.name: Cleaning
maid.description:
$name will dedicate $his time to tidying your mansion. 

[color=yellow]Efficiency grows with Agility and Endurance.[/color]
maid.workline: $name will spend $his day dedicated to cleaning your mansion.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.description:
$name will help residents maintain and recover their health.

[color=yellow]Efficiency grows with Wit and Magic Affinity.[/color]
nurse.workline: $name will be watching over resident's health.

whorewimborn.name: W - Prostitution
whorewimborn.description:
$name will be assigned to the town's brothel as a common whore.

[color=yellow]
Efficiency grows with Charm, Endurance, Beauty and basic sexual actions. 

Requires unlocked sex actions for sufficient performance.[/color]

escortwimborn.name: W - Escort
escortwimborn.description:
$name will be assigned to the town's brothel as a high class whore for rich men. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of a [color=aqua]Commoner[/color] or higher. 

Efficiency grows with Charm, Confidence, Beauty and your reputation. [/color]
escortwimborn.workline: $name will be earning money as an escort for rich people.

fucktoywimborn.name: W - Exotic Whore
fucktoywimborn.description:
$name will be used by the most deviant men in the brothel. 

[color=yellow]Efficiency grows with Courage, Endurance, Beauty, and advanced sex actions. 

Requires unlocked advanced sex actions for sufficient performance. [/color]
fucktoywimborn.workline: $name will be earning money by offering $his body for all sorts of deviant plays.

fucktoy.name: U - Fucktoy
fucktoy.description:
$name will be subjugated and abused by all sorts of criminals in Umbra without $his consent. 

[color=yellow]Builds obedience in exchange for mental degeneration. Income is based on your negative reputation. [/color]
fucktoy.workline: $name will be subjugated and abused by all sorts of criminals in Umbra without $his consent.

storewimborn.name: W - Market
storewimborn.description:
$name will attempt to sell excessive supplies or will try to make some profit by speculating with cheap products. 

[color=yellow]Efficiency grows with Charm, Wit and Grade. [/color]
storewimborn.workline: $name will be working at the town's market.

assistwimborn.name: W - Mage Order Assistant
assistwimborn.description:
$name will work as a staff member on various guild assignments. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Commoner[/color] or higher. 

Efficiency grows with Magic Affinity, Wits and your reputation.[/color]
assistwimborn.workline: $name will be working for the Mage's Order.

artistwimborn.name: W - Public Entertainer
artistwimborn.description:
$name will earn money by doing dances, shows and other stage performances. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Commoner[/color] or higher. 

Efficiency grows with Charm, Courage, Agility and beauty.[/color]
artistwimborn.workline: $name will be working as a public entertainer.

lumberer.name: F - Lumberer
lumberer.description:
$name will be cutting down trees near Frostford for a woodcutting company. [color=yellow]

Efficiency grows with Strength and Endurance.[/color]
lumberer.workline: $name will be cutting down trees near Frostford.

ffprostitution.name: F - Prostitution
ffprostitution.description:
$name will be serving lone customers with $his body at Frostford. 

[color=yellow]

Efficiency grows with Charm and beauty.[/color]
ffprostitution.workline: $name will be serving lone customers with $his body in the streets of Frostford.

guardian.name: G - Guardian
guardian.description:
$name will be patrolling streets with Gorn's city guard. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Poor[/color] or higher. 

Efficiency grows with Strength, Courage.[/color]
guardian.workline: $name will be patrolling streets with Gorn's city guard.

research.name: U - Research Subject
research.description:
$name will be used in harsh experiments in Umbra. 

[color=yellow]

Will earn a lot of money, but quickly deteriorate physical and mental health.[/color] 
[color=#ff4949]Can have negative consequences and even sometimes kill the servant. [/color]
research.workline: $name will be used in harsh experiments in Umbra.

slavecatcher.name: G - Slave Catcher
slavecatcher.description:
$name will be joining slaver parties and help catching and transporting slaves. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Poor[/color] or higher. 

Efficiency grows with Agility, Strength and Courage.[/color]
slavecatcher.workline: $name will be joining slaver parties and help catching and transporting slaves around Gorn.

headgirl.name: Headgirl
headgirl.description:
$name will watch over other servants, improving their behavior. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Rich[/color] or higher.
headgirl.workline: $name will be directing and managing other residents.

jailer.name: Jailer
jailer.description:
$name will be feeding and watching over your prisoners.

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Poor[/color] or higher.

farmmanager.name: Farm Manager
farmmanager.description:
$name will be managing your farm and slaves assigned to it. 

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Commoner[/color] or higher.
farmmanager.workline: $name will be looking over your farm and collect its income.

labassist.name: Laboratory Assistant
labassist.description:
$name will be helping out and managing your laboratory operations.

[color=yellow]Requires grade of [color=aqua]Commoner[/color] or higher.
labassist.workline: $name will be assisting you in the laboratory.
